description.en: XIDR is the fully collateralised Indonesian Rupiah stablecoin, powered by open-source blockchain protocols. XIDR aims to be the most cost-effective IDR-backed stablecoin, where minting and redemption of XIDR with IDR is available via the StraitsX platform for free, and where outbound on-chain transaction fees are capped.
